This is an excellent bakkie, still in very good condition. A reliable bakkie, with room to put a lot more kms on the clock. The extended cab is the perfect option if you need a vehicle for both personal and business use. It has plenty of space behind the seats, to keep your tools, or seven shopping, safe and dry.
Test drives are available, trade ins are welcome and finance can be arranged.
Please note that the advertised price does not include admin fees of R8500 which will be charged on all vehicles sold.
